attributes.action: Justice for the DEATH of the NURSE, after DJ's prank call!
attributes.additional_details:
E-petition the UK government to have the Austrialian Government, bring charges of Corporate manslaughter againts the two Austrailian DJ's, who caused the unnecassary death of the nurse, after there prank phone call.

Please sign this E-petition, lets get the 100,000 signatures needed, so we can get justice for the young nurse!
